p: Deceased; Landlord from Rajasthan’s Sri Ganganagar district
Age not known, but lives at Dera Sacha Sauda.
Headed Dera Sacha Sauda till his conviction and sentencing in two rape cases in August.
Age not known, but lives at Dera Sacha Sauda as a sadhvi.

Honeypreet is another contender for the post of Dera chief. Born Priyanka Taneja, Honeypreet is a divorced woman who Ram Rahim adopted as a daughter and who has been living with him since her divorce. She has also directed and produced all of Ram Rahim’s movies.
Has been named as Ram Rahim's successor by grandmother Naseeb Kaur.
Both Amarpreet and her husband, Ruh-e-Meet, live at the Dera and have been assigned duties for the functioning of the Dera.
Both Charanpreet and her husband, Shan-e-Meet, live at the Dera and have been assigned duties for the functioning of the Dera.
Married to Jasmeet Singh, Husanpreet is the daughter of former Congress MLA from Bathinda, Harminder Singh Jassi.
